title: Rhino christmas
creator_credit: John Armstrong, Fiona Cochrane, Cochrane Productions and Armstrong
brief_description: It’s a hot and boringly predictable Christmas Day in the suburbs and Mott wishes it would snow. She’s sick of presents that are educational and of going to the beach with her new-age parents who meditate all day. But then weird things happen in this off beat fantasy.
creator_credit_for_label: John Armstrong, Fiona Cochrane, Cochrane Productions and Armstrong
